response.title: Spain's Renewable Energy Push Gains Momentum Amid Climate Crisis
response.summary: El Pais reports on Spain's recent investments in offshore wind farms and solar energy projects to reduce carbon emissions by 2030.

response.title: UN Climate Summit: Global Leaders Call for Urgent Action on Emissions
response.summary: El Pais coverage of the 2023 UN Climate Change Conference, highlighting demands for faster transition to renewable energy and funding for vulnerable nations.

response.title: Heatwaves in Europe: A Warning from Climate Scientists
response.summary: Experts warn of escalating extreme weather events linked to climate change, citing record temperatures across Southern Europe this summer.
